name: requestHypervVirtualMachineForceFullSnapshot
description: Request a full snapshot during the next backup job of a Hyper-V virtual machine.

id.description: ID of the Hyper-V virtual machine.

body.description: Configuration created to force a full snapshot on the Hyper-V virtual machine.

$ul: **virtualDiskInfos**: Configuration for each virtual disk that requested a forced full snapshot. If the configuration does not exist, either a forced full snapshot was not requested for the HyperV virtual machine, or a backup job took the requested full snapshot and cleared the configuration.
**vmId**: ID of the Hyper-V virtual machine containing all virtual disks.
